evaluations.question: Which scholars won Physics in 1921?
evaluations.model_answer: Albert Einstein won the Physics Nobel Prize in 1921.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1921
RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year

evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear > 1990
RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year
ORDER BY p.awardYear

evaluations.question: Which scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany died between the years 1935 and 1945?
evaluations.model_answer:
The scholars affiliated with an institution in Germany who died between the years 1935 and 1945 are Carl Bosch and Hans Spemann.

Carl Bosch, who was affiliated with I.G. Farbenindustrie A.G. and University of Heidelberg, died on April 26, 1940.

Hans Spemann, who was affiliated with University of Freiburg im Breisgau, died on September 12, 1941.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country),
      (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(b:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(bc:Country)
WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'germany' AND toLower(bc.name) = 'germany'
WITH s, i
WHERE s.deathDate >= '1935-01-01' AND s.deathDate <= '1945-12-31'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS ScholarName, i.name AS AffiliatedInstitutionName, s.deathDate AS DeathDate

evaluations.question: Which scholars won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1933?
evaluations.model_answer: The scholars who won the Nobel Prize in Physics in 1933 were Paul A.M. Dirac and Erwin Schrödinger.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear = 1933
RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year

evaluations.question: Who are the female laureates in Physics?
evaluations.model_answer: The female laureates in Physics are Andrea Ghez, Donna Strickland, Maria Goeppert Mayer, and Marie Curie.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(s.gender) = 'female' AND toLower(p.category) = 'physics'
RETURN s.knownName AS laureate, p.category AS category, p.awardYear AS award_year

evaluations.question: Which scholars born in France won a Nobel Prize in Chemistry?

evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) 
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND toLower(p.category) = 'nobel chemistry'
MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'france'
RETURN s.knownName, p.awardYear

evaluations.question: Which Physics laureates were affiliated with an institution in Denmark?
evaluations.model_answer: The Physics laureates affiliated with an institution in Denmark are Aage N. Bohr, Ben R. Mottelson, and Niels Bohr.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) 
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics'
MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE toLower(co.name) = 'denmark'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName, i.name AS InstitutionName

evaluations.question: Which scholars affiliated with Stanford University won a prize in 1996?
evaluations.model_answer: Douglas D. Osheroff won a physics prize in 1996 and is affiliated with Stanford University.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) 
WHERE p.awardYear = 1996 
MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) 
WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'stanford university' 
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName, p.category, i.name AS Institution

MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)
WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'france'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS ScholarName, p.awardYear AS PrizeYear, i.name AS InstitutionName

evaluations.question: Which scholars won Chemistry in 1990?
evaluations.model_answer: Elias James Corey won the Chemistry Nobel Prize in 1990.
evaluations.generated_cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 1990 AND toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' RETURN s.knownName

evaluations.question: Which scholars born in Taiwan won the Chemistry prize between 1986 and 1991?
evaluations.model_answer: No information found in the database.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) 
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'chemistry' AND p.awardYear >= 1986 AND p.awardYear <= 1991 
MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) 
WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'taiwan' 
RETURN s.knownName, p.awardYear

evaluations.question: Which scholars affiliated with Institute for Infectious Diseases won a prize in Physiology or Medicine?
evaluations.model_answer: Robert Koch, who is affiliated with the Institute for Infectious Diseases, won a prize in Physiology or Medicine in 1905.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'institute for infectious diseases'
MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS 'medicine'
RETURN s.knownName, p.awardYear

evaluations.question: Which scholars affiliated with CERN won a prize in Physics?
evaluations.model_answer: The scholars affiliated with CERN who won a prize in Physics are Carlo Rubbia, Simon van der Meer, Georges Charpak, and Jack Steinberger. They received their awards in the years 1984, 1984, 1992, and 1988, respectively.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS 'physics'
MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)
WHERE toLower(i.name) = 'cern'
RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year, i.name AS institution

evaluations.question: Which scholars affiliated with University of Oxford won a prize in Chemistry?
evaluations.model_answer: The scholars affiliated with the University of Oxford who won a prize in Chemistry are Dorothy Crowfoot Hodgkin, Frederick Soddy, Sir Robert Robinson, and Sir Cyril Hinshelwood.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) 
MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)
WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS 'chemistry' AND toLower(i.name) CONTAINS 'university of oxford'
RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year, i.name AS institution

evaluations.question: Which scholars were born in Pretoria?
evaluations.model_answer: The scholars born in Pretoria are Michael Levitt and Max Theiler.
evaluations.generated_cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City) WHERE toLower(ci.name) = 'pretoria' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, ci.name AS birth_city

evaluations.question: Which scholars were born in Turin?
evaluations.model_answer: The scholars born in Turin are Rita Levi-Montalcini and Salvador E. Luria.
evaluations.generated_cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City) WHERE toLower(ci.name) = 'turin' RETURN s.knownName AS scholar

evaluations.question: Which scholars born in Switzerland won the Physics prize between 1980 and 2020?
evaluations.model_answer: The scholars born in Switzerland who won the Physics prize between 1980 and 2020 are K. Alex Müller in 1987 and Didier Queloz and Michel Mayor in 2019.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS 'switzerland'
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(c)
MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics' AND p.awardYear >= 1980 AND p.awardYear <= 2020
RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, p.awardYear AS award_year
ORDER BY p.awardYear

evaluations.question: How many female scholars won a Nobel Prize between 1980 and 2000?
evaluations.model_answer: Between 1980 and 2000, there were 4 female scholars who won a Nobel Prize.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(s.gender) = 'female' AND p.awardYear >= 1980 AND p.awardYear <= 2000
RETURN count(DISTINCT s) AS female_laureates

evaluations.question: Which scholars have won more than one Nobel Prize?
evaluations.model_answer: The scholars who have won more than one Nobel Prize are Frederick Sanger, Linus Pauling, Marie Curie, K. Barry Sharpless, and John Bardeen.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize)
WITH s, COUNT(p) AS prize_count
WHERE prize_count > 1
RETURN s.knownName

evaluations.question: How many Physics laureates were born in Paris?
evaluations.model_answer: The Physics laureates born in Paris are 3.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) = 'physics'
MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE toLower(c.name) CONTAINS 'paris'
RETURN count(s) as physics_laureates

evaluations.question: How many scholars won a prize with a 1/3 share portion?
evaluations.model_answer: 222 scholars won a prize with a 1/3 share portion.
evaluations.generated_cypher:
MATCH (s:Scholar)-[r:WON]->(p:Prize)
WHERE toLower(r.portion) = '1/3'
RETURN count(s) as scholars_with_third_share
